heading: Today
text: Any morning valley fog lifting, giving way to mostly sunny skies, except for some clouds in the south near the Massachusetts border. Highs in the 70s. Light south to southeast wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear to partly cloudy. Patchy valley fog developing before dawn. Lows mainly in the 40s, low to mid 50s in the southeastern and western valleys. Light and variable wind.

heading: Thursday
text: Patchy valley fog early, then becoming mostly to partly sunny. Highs from the low to mid 70s, upper 70s to near 80 in the warmer valleys. Wind becoming northwest 5 to 15 mph.
